Travel Essentials

Your comprehensive checklist for a safe and comfortable journey in the Himalayas.

Clothing
Waterproof trekking shoes
Lightweight wool sweaters
Waterproof jacket and pants
T-shirts and trekking pants
Thermal innerwear
Woolen socks
Sun hat and woolen cap
Gloves or mittens
Trekking Gear
Backpack with rain cover
Trekking poles
Headlamp or flashlight
Water bottle or hydration pack
Daypack for short hikes
Documents & Essentials
Government-issued ID (Aadhaar, Passport)
Printed travel itinerary
Cash (ATMs may be scarce)
Mobile phone and power bank
Health & First Aid
Personal medications
Basic first-aid kit (band-aids, antiseptic)
Pain relievers (Ibuprofen, Paracetamol)
Sunscreen and lip balm with SPF
Insect repellent
Hand sanitizer
Electronics & Gadgets
Camera and extra batteries
Portable charger/power bank
Binoculars for wildlife viewing
Universal travel adapter
